txt.en:
'Adventurer, you seem worthy enough to join our efforts.

'The opening of the demon-pits nearby has unleashed hordes of Orcs into these lands, and we mean to push them back. I ask of you to help thin their numbers.

'They can be found throughout the area of Urash Dâr, though you may find a concentration of them in the camps to the north and east of here.'
Return to Uda at her camp and let her know you have reduced the number of Orcs in the area.
Return to Uda at her camp near Utug-bûr
Uda is unhappy with the number of Orcs in the area and has asked that you help her to reduce it.
Returned to Uda at her camp near Utug-bûr

'You have returned. I trust that means you have completed your task?

'Thank you, my friend. These lands are still dangerous, but I am glad to see people such as yourself helping our cause.

'I ask of you to continue to reduce their numbers, should you encounter any more.'
Uda has asked you to slay Orcs in Urash Dâr to help her thin their numbers.
